niagara.data_manager
Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
  niagara.data_manager.DataManager

public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object

Initial implementation of data manager no memory management essentially managing two directories

Version:
1
See Also:
YPClient

getDTDInfo

public DTDInfo getDTDInfo(java.util.Vector requestList)
Generate a SE request from a vector of predicates. Send this request to the SE using YPClient. The response will be an xml doc. Parse it and return it to the caller This call will block while the search engine request is being serviced.

Parameters:
requestList - a vector of requests
Returns:
a TXDocument for the parsed root of xml file containing DTDinfo
Throws:
DMClosedException - this function called while data manager is being closed

public boolean shutdown()
Gracefully shutdown the Data Manager by terminating all threads etc.
